mainBoard.flavorText: "Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity." —D'Avenant proverb
mainBoard.name: Alabaster Potion
mainBoard.originalText: Target player gains X life or prevents X damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains X life.
• Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

mainBoard.name: Black Lotus
mainBoard.originalText: Adds 3 mana of any single color of your choice to your mana pool, then is discarded. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add three mana of any one color.

mainBoard.flavorText: "'War is no picnic,' my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree." —*General Chanek Valteroth*
mainBoard.name: Carrion Ants
mainBoard.originalText: {1}: +1/+1 until end of turn.
mainBoard.text: {1}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: From the Sardian mountains wakes ancient doom: Warrior born from a rocky womb.
mainBoard.name: Colossus of Sardia
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
Colossus does not untap normally during untap phase; you may spend {9} during your upkeep phase to untap Colossus.

rulings.text: The ability that untaps it during your upkeep has been returned to an activated ability. There is no restriction on how many times it can be untapped during your upkeep with this ability.

mainBoard.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
This creature doesn't untap during your untap step.
{9}: Untap this creature. Activate only during your upkeep.

foreignData.name: Kraftsog
foreignData.text: Dein Gegner muß alles Mana aus seinem verfügbaren Ländern produzieren. Dieses Mana und alles Mana, das er in seinem Manavorrat hat, fließt nun in Deinen Manavorrat.

mainBoard.name: Drain Power
mainBoard.originalText: Opponent must draw all mana from his or her available lands; this mana and all mana in opponent's mana pool drains into your mana pool. You can't take less than all your opponent's mana.

rulings.text: If a land can draw a variable amount of mana, the target player (not the player of this spell) chooses how much to draw.

This card forces the target player to draw mana from lands if they are untapped, but that player can choose how to draw the mana if a land they control has multiple mana abilities, or mana abilities with choices.
Your opponent may use instants and abilities of permanents in response to this spell before you get the mana.
A mana ability is an ability that (1) isn't a loyalty ability, (2) doesn't target, and (3) could add mana when it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Kismet
mainBoard.originalText: All creatures, lands, and artifacts played by opponent come into play tapped.

rulings.text: Does not affect cards that phase in.
It affects all opponents.
The appropriate permanents enter tapped. They do not enter untapped and then immediately tap, therefore they do not trigger any effects due to tapping.

mainBoard.text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter tapped.

foreignData.name: Kormusglocke
foreignData.text: Alle Sümpfe werden zu 1/1 Kreaturen. Sie zählen immer noch als Länder, und Du kannst sie für Mana tappen —allerdings nicht in dem Zug, im dem sie ins Spiel kommen.

mainBoard.name: Kormus Bell
mainBoard.originalText: Treat all swamps in play as 1/1 creatures. Now they can be enchanted, killed, and so forth, and they can be tapped either for mana or to attack.

rulings.text: It affects Swamps controlled by any and all players.
The lands are both lands and creatures at the same time. They are affected by anything that affects either permanent type.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text: All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

foreignData.name: Stein der Sanftmut
foreignData.text: Keine Kreatur mit einer Stärke größer als 2 kann während der Enttap-Phase enttappt werden.

mainBoard.name: Meekstone
mainBoard.originalText: Any creature with power greater than 2 may not be untapped as normal during the untap phase.
mainBoard.text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

mainBoard.name: Mox Jet
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 black mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.name: Mox Pearl
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 white mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.name: Mox Sapphire
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 blue mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

foreignData.name: Kraftverlust
foreignData.text: Der Zielspruch wird neutralisiert, wenn dessen Urheber nicht sofort X ausgibt. Er muß alles verfügbare Mana aus seinem Manavorrat und seinen Ländern ausgeben, bis X bezahlt ist; wenn benötigt, kann er auch andere Manaquellen heranziehen.

mainBoard.name: Power Sink
mainBoard.originalText: Target spell is countered unless its caster spends X more mana. Caster of target spell must draw and spend all available mana from lands and mana pool until X is spent; he or she may also spend mana from other sources if desired. If this is not enough mana, target spell will still be countered.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

foreignData.name: Seelengift
foreignData.text: Wenn das verzauberte Land getappt wird, fügt das Seelengift dessen Beherrscher 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Psychic Venom
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever target land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom does 2 damage to target land's controller.

rulings.text: Whenever the land is tapped for any reason, the ability triggers.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, this Aura deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mainBoard.flavorText: Trained in the arts of stealth, the royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.
mainBoard.name: Royal Assassin
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Destroy any tapped creature.

rulings.text: Can't target itself because you choose the target before you tap him. At that time he is not yet a legal target.
If the creature is no longer tapped when the Assassin's ability resolves, then the ability doesn't resolve.

mainBoard.flavorText: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

foreignData.name: Serra-Engel
foreignData.text:
Kann fliegen
Der Serra- Engel wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.

mainBoard.name: Serra Angel
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Serra Angel to tap.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

mainBoard.flavorText:
Born like a Phoenix from the Flame, But neither Bulk nor Shape the same.
—Jonathan Swift, "Vanbrug's House"
mainBoard.name: Shapeshifter
mainBoard.originalText: The *s below represent any number from 0 to 6. You set * when Shapeshifter is cast, and you may change it during your upkeep.

rulings.text: The ability that lets you choose a new number is a triggered ability that triggers only once each upkeep.
The ability that sets its power and toughness is a characteristic-defining ability. This means it applies before any other effects that modify power and/or toughness.

mainBoard.text:
As this creature enters, choose a number between 0 and 7.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7.
Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

foreignData.name: Lockruf der Sirenen
foreignData.text: Sämtliche Kreaturen des Gegners, die angreifen könnten, müssen angreifen. Alle Kreaturen, die es nicht tun und keine Mauern sind, werden am Ende der Spielrunde vernichtet. Dieser Spontanzauber kann nur gespielt werden, wenn der Gegner am Ende des Zuges ist, und nur vor seiner Angriffsphase. Kreaturen, die während dieser Runde heraufbeschworen wurden, bleiben vom Lockruf der Sirenen verschont.

mainBoard.name: Siren's Call
mainBoard.originalText: All of opponent's creatures that can attack must do so. Any non-wall creatures that cannot attack are killed at end of turn. Can be played only during opponent's turn, before opponent's attack. Creatures summoned this turn are unaffected by Siren's Call.

rulings.text: It will require creatures with Haste to attack since they are able, but it won’t destroy them if they don’t for some reason.
The creature is destroyed if it does not attack because it simply can’t do so legally.
This will destroy creatures that weren’t able to attack because they had been previously tapped.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can only be cast before the beginning of the Declare Attackers Step of the first combat phase in that turn.

mainBoard.text:
Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared.
Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able.
At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Twiddle
mainBoard.originalText: Caster may tap or untap any one land, creature, or artifact in play. No effects are generated by the target card.

rulings.text: The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.
This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.

mainBoard.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

mainBoard.flavorText: "That was the worst experience of my days, standing there helpless as they killed my whole troop." —Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*
mainBoard.name: Word of Binding
mainBoard.originalText: X target creatures become tapped.

mainBoard.flavorText: After Kroog was destroyed while most of its defenders were at his side, Urza vowed that none of his allies would ever need to fear for their own defense again, even while laying siege to a city far from their homes.
mainBoard.name: Yotian Soldier
mainBoard.originalText: Attacking does not cause Yotian Soldier to tap.
